text: $ fly secrets set -a my-remote-env PASSWORD=<my-password> FLY_API_TOKEN=$(fly auth token)
annot:
Let's skip ahead a little bit. There are going to be environment variables I'll want inside my VM. I'm using `fly secrets` to get them there.

code-server will set its own password on installation if I don't set the PASSWORD environment variable. That's ok; I can ssh into the VM later and extract it from a config file; but it's easier to set it ahead.
